content.text: I'll read the mix.exs file to extract the version number and create a VERSION.txt file.

content.content:
1→defmodule ClaudeCode.MixProject do
     2→  use Mix.Project
     3→
     4→  @version "0.1.0-alpha.1"
     5→  @source_url "https://github.com/guess/claude_code"
     6→
     7→  def project do
     8→    [
     9→      app: :claude_code,
    10→      version: @version,
    11→      elixir: "~> 1.16",
    12→      elixirc_paths: elixirc_paths(Mix.env()),
    13→      start_permanent: Mix.env() == :prod,
    14→      deps: deps(),
    15→      aliases: aliases(),
    16→      test_coverage: [tool: ExCoveralls],
    17→      preferred_cli_env: [
    18→        coveralls: :test,
    19→        "coveralls.detail": :test,
    20→        "coveralls.post": :test,
    21→        "coveralls.html": :test,
    22→        "coveralls.github": :test
    23→      ],
    24→
    25→      # Hex
    26→      package: package(),
    27→      description: "An idiomatic Elixir SDK for Claude Code AI assistant",
    28→
    29→      # Docs
    30→      name: "ClaudeCode",
    31→      docs: docs(),
    32→      source_url: @source_url,
    33→      homepage_url: @source_url
    34→    ]
    35→  end
    36→
    37→  # Run "mix help compile.app" to learn about applications.
    38→  def application do
    39→    [
    40→      extra_applications: [:logger]
    41→    ]
    42→  end
    43→
    44→  # Specifies which paths to compile per environment.
    45→  defp elixirc_paths(:test), do: ["lib", "test/support"]
    46→  defp elixirc_paths(_), do: ["lib"]
    47→
    48→  # Run "mix help deps" to learn about dependencies.
    49→  defp deps do
    50→    [
    51→      # Production dependencies
    52→      {:jason, "~> 1.4"},
    53→      {:nimble_options, "~> 1.0"},
    54→      {:telemetry, "~> 1.2"},
    55→
    56→      # Development and test dependencies
    57→      {:styler, "~> 1.0", only: [:dev, :test], runtime: false},
    58→      {:credo, "~> 1.7", only: [:dev, :test], runtime: false},
    59→      {:dialyxir, "~> 1.4", only: [:dev, :test], runtime: false},
    60→      {:ex_doc, "~> 0.34", only: :dev, runtime: false},
    61→      {:excoveralls, "~> 0.18", only: :test},
    62→      {:mox, "~> 1.1", only: :test},
    63→      {:stream_data, "~> 1.1", only: [:test, :dev]}
    64→    ]
    65→  end
    66→
    67→  defp aliases do
    68→    [
    69→      # Ensure code quality before commit
    70→      quality: [
    71→        "compile --warnings-as-errors",
    72→        "format --check-formatted",
    73→        "credo --strict",
    74→        "dialyzer"
    75→      ],
    76→      # Run all tests with coverage
    77→      "test.all": [
    78→        "test --cover",
    79→        "coveralls.html"
    80→      ]
    81→    ]
    82→  end
    83→
    84→  defp package do
    85→    [
    86→      files: ~w(lib .formatter.exs mix.exs README.md LICENSE CHANGELOG.md),
    87→      licenses: ["MIT"],
    88→      links: %{
    89→        "GitHub" => @source_url,
    90→        "Changelog" => "#{@source_url}/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md"
    91→      }
    92→    ]
    93→  end
    94→
    95→  defp docs do
    96→    [
    97→      main: "readme",
    98→      source_ref: "v#{@version}",
    99→      source_url: @source_url,
   100→      extras: [
   101→        "README.md",
   102→        "CHANGELOG.md",
   103→        "LICENSE",
   104→        "docs/ROADMAP.md",
   105→        "docs/VISION.md",
   106→        "docs/ARCHITECTURE.md",
   107→        "docs/DEV_SETUP.md"
   108→      ],
   109→      groups_for_modules: [
   110→        "Core API": [
   111→          ClaudeCode,
   112→          ClaudeCode.Session,
   113→          ClaudeCode.Options
   114→        ],
   115→        Messages: ~r/ClaudeCode.Message/,
   116→        "Content Blocks": ~r/ClaudeCode.Content/,
   117→        Permissions: ~r/ClaudeCode.Permission/,
   118→        Errors: ~r/ClaudeCode.Error/,
   119→        Testing: [
   120→          ClaudeCode.Test
   121→        ]
   122→      ]
   123→    ]
   124→  end
   125→end
   126→

content.text: Done. Created VERSION.txt with version 0.1.0-alpha.1 from mix.exs:4.

result: Done. Created VERSION.txt with version 0.1.0-alpha.1 from mix.exs:4.
